column2: ggplot(aes(reorder(player_name, -total_points), total_points, fill = player_name)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity", color = "purple") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) + labs(title = sprintf("The top 10 players with the highest FPL points in %s", unique(df$season)), x = "Player", y = "FPL points")
